Review: Friendly and accomodating staff. Big pool for big kids. A very good value for money for a family.
Room is kinda dark, too far from airport and hard to find.

The suite has a living room, kitchenette (complete with kitchen implements and appliances), small fridge, TV, aircon and telephone downstairs. Upstairs, it has 2 large rooms with equally large closets and plenty of chest of drawers and bureaus. Both rooms are equipped with A/C. Bathroom is shared. Drawback is the paneling of the toilet and shower is made of opaque glass and the mirrored lavatory is directly across. So it's pretty uncomfortable sharing the bathroom with another. The master has a king bed with TV and telephone but no view, but lots of space still for an extra bed. The other room has 2 double beds and has a small terrace overlooking the pool. Pool is until 10pm. Not much tables or beach chairs to laze around though. Smoking is prohibited. The room comes with its own garrage. Breakfast food is ok, not great. But those that we ordered from the kitchen were good. The hotel asks for a refundable deposit. You need to walk a short distance to reach the main road to get a ride.
The accommodations are in very poor shape. The bathrooms are in Terrible shape. Nothing works . Very bad odors .the only thing that is Ok there is the staff. Very helpful .

Staff are helpful and very approchable..buffet breakfast is good but needs to add more options..facilities needs more improvement (kitchen wares must be available always and not upon request). Overall rating: Satisfied!
Staff are friendly, facilities are very good.

the standard rooms looks old, smelly and creepy :( the staff were very nice and accommodating we upgrade to a villa accommodation even though we're just two.

Nice hotel , pool little small. Rooms clean and decent size without being big. Breakfast was good. Small high roller casino ($150us min ) and small pagcor pokie room. Nice restaurants in hotel and not super pricey. Busy area , big mall 200 m away. many clubs and bars close . Would stay again. Just watch the local pick pockets.
But not recommendable
Satisfied stay... Good supportive and understanding staff. Free pinoy breakfast . Clean room and Facility. 7/ 10 Will definitely come back.

Family villa is very spacious for four people. There's a living room, dining table, kitchen and restroom on the first floor. A space for car parking is located at the back of the villa, while the front is facing the swimming pool. Second floor has 2 rooms, one with twin bed and the other-queen size. I travelled with senior citizens so having all rooms upstairs is not very ideal. They have friendly staff, though the amenities is not so new. We had broken TV switch, and shower. But then it was all functioning, so nothing major. Getting a taxi from the hotel is easy as they have a taxi line outside, and the reception staff can call it for you anytime.
Very Good
Location is very good

Order took more than an hour. Sinks clogged. Microwave oven not provided with plate. Tapwater was rusty; though they did label it as non potable, shouldn't be that yellow and filthy. Fixtures need renovation and maintenance. Rugs requested for slippery floors came in the next day. Lights busted. Very different experience from years back when we really enjoyed staying here... Guess good things never last...
If in Davao will stay there again

Pool is dirty, even my Filipino friends told the same. You can hardly see ground! About 6-7 years ago Jacuzzi had hot water but ever since I've been there the water is colder than in pool. Seems heater died but they do not feel it's necessary to repair/replace. I was there this time a bit than more than 2 weeks and once out of 3 beer brands 2 went out of stock. It took 2 days to refill! Same with Whiskey. I finished Jack Daniel's first first couple of days then Johnnie Walker and finally last brand. In 2 weeks no signs to have anything refilled. I had to pump my toilet for 2 weeks. One day 3 Houskeepking guys and 2 Maintenance guys were working on it but I still had to continue pumping! Housekeeping forgot sometimes to put shampoo, soap, complimentary water and coffee. One day they did not change towels and they said they are in laundry wet and will replace 15:00 afternoons but nothing happened. Often when you opened tab they was brown water running! Balcony door was hard to open/close. I needed 2 hands and 1 feet! Bowles outside room where most people put empty bottles, dirty dishes from roomservice as well as leftovers, was not removed sometimes for almost one day. In the heat the leftover food start smelling! Entrance doors as well as some inside doors are squeaking. I could hear my neighbours doors squeaking as well. Annoying when you try find your sleep and you always hear that kind of noise. Connection pool side of Wifi always dropped and got stuck! it was best sitting on balcony but some years ago I could use Wifi in the master bedroom which is backside of hotel. Reception told me they know they have problem with poolside router and I should go to restaurant (different router). I said it is hassle to to restaurant every time. She said they don't know when problem solved. Why they promote FREE Wifi? Every time I stay there it got worse. Also some furniture damaged but they don't fix or replace. TV was not working for about 2 hours. Houskeeping guy was there th

The internet is only available in the pool area, cafe, front desk and other rooms but not in the family villa we rented. We had to rely on the wifi in the pool area but very slow inside our room.

This hotel really need a makeover. I was very disappointed in regards to the impression of the rooms. Just imagine a really wormed out hotel that the 70ies called and wanted back. Sorry, but I will not stay there again and I will not recommend anyone to do too. You can find just as good hotel for less money in Davao.

Quaint and comfortable. Cable TV has almost everything :) Interesting fifties themed cafe Hideaway from the main road. Quiet and restful until the guests come out to play by the pool. Only 1.50 usd from airport taxi fare. Robinsons supermarket is 5 minutes away by taxi. Posturepedic mattresses. Shower rooms on both floors.
